item.title: Dr. Jesse F. Leaman
item.description: Dr. Jesse F. Leaman is a Postdoctoral Research Fellow in the AutoAI Lab at the Department of Automotive Engineering, Clemson University International Center for Automotive Research (CU-ICAR) since Feb. 2022. He received his Ph.D. in Astrophysics in 2008 at the University of California, Berkeley. His research interests include AI for Astrophysics, Robotic Astronomy, Robotic Wheelchairs and Assistive Mobility, Human-Robot Interaction, Human-centered AI, AI for Climate. Contact Email: jfleama@clemson.edu
